name: Boot Loop
description:
Our casual entry to the game jam. Since we decided to do this last minute, we decided to try working on a simpler game that focused on being fun.
You play as a small robot trying to get through a looping room.
Every time you complete a level, you exit the room only to enter the same one... we may have added a few things to it. Be careful.

Controls:
WASD and/or Arrows

Programmers:
Ryan Wasil and Ben Campbell

Artwork: 
Ryan Wasil

Music: 
Ben Campbell (please be nice, I started playing bass two months ago)

Take a look at the code used in this game here: https://github.com/ventusCaclium/BootLoop
